`newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this. _Available since v3.1._"},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call, an admin role bearer except when using {AccessControl-_setupRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call: addSupportedToken(address).details: Solo puede ser llamado por ADMIN_ROLE. Obtiene automticamente los decimales del token

params.bankCapUSD: Lmite mximo del banco en USD (6 decimales)
params.withdrawalLimitUSD: Lmite de retiro por transaccin en USD (6 decimales)

depositERC20(address,uint256).details: El token debe estar en la whitelist y tener decimales configurados

params.amount: Cantidad a depositar en unidades del token

depositETH().details: Convierte el valor a USD usando Chainlink y actualiza balances

returns._0: Espacio disponible en USD con 6 decimales
Precio de ETH en USD con 8 decimales

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

returns._0: Array con las direcciones de los tokens soportados
Balance total en USD con 6 decimales
Balance del usuario en USD con 6 decimales

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

returns._0: true si el token est soportado, false en caso contrario

removeSupportedToken(address).details: Solo puede ser llamado por ADMIN_ROLE

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

setEthUsdFeed(address).details: Solo puede ser llamado por ADMIN_ROLE

params.amount: Cantidad a retirar en unidades del token

withdrawETH(uint256).details: Valida lmites en USD antes de permitir el retiro

params.amount: Cantidad de ETH a retirar en wei

BANK_CAP_USD().notice: Lmite mximo del banco en USD (6 decimales)

USDC().notice: Direccin del token USDC (usado por extensiones como V3)

WITHDRAWAL_LIMIT_USD().notice: Lmite de retiro por transaccin en USD (6 decimales)

addSupportedToken(address).notice: Agrega un token a la whitelist

depositERC20(address,uint256).notice: Deposita tokens ERC-20 en el banco

getAvailableSpaceUSD().notice: Calcula el espacio disponible antes de alcanzar el bank cap

getCounters().notice: Obtiene los contadores de depsitos y retiros

getEthUsdPrice().notice: Obtiene el precio actual de ETH en USD desde Chainlink

getSupportedTokens().notice: Obtiene la lista de todos los tokens soportados

getTotalBankBalanceUSD().notice: Obtiene el balance total del banco en USD

getUserBalance(address,address).notice: Obtiene el balance de un usuario para un token especfico

isTokenSupported(address).notice: Verifica si un token est soportado

removeSupportedToken(address).notice: Remueve un token de la whitelist

setEthUsdFeed(address).notice: Actualiza el feed de Chainlink para ETH/USD
